segments.pli: “Dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo na sevitabbo.
segments.en: “Mendicants, you should not associate with a person who has ten qualities.

segments.pli: Micchādiṭṭhiko hoti, micchāsaṅkappo hoti, micchāvāco hoti, micchākammanto hoti, micchāājīvo hoti, micchāvāyāmo hoti, micchāsati hoti, micchāsamādhi hoti, micchāñāṇī hoti, micchāvimutti hoti—
segments.en: Wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.

segments.pli: imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo na sevitabbo.
segments.en: You should not associate with a person who has these ten qualities.

segments.pli: Dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo sevitabbo.
segments.en: You should associate with a person who has ten qualities.

segments.pli: Sammādiṭṭhiko hoti, sammāsaṅkappo hoti, sammāvāco hoti, sammākammanto hoti, sammāājīvo hoti, sammāvāyāmo hoti, sammāsati hoti, sammāsamādhi hoti, sammāñāṇī hoti, sammāvimutti hoti—
segments.en: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.

segments.pli: imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo sevitabbo”ti.
segments.en: You should associate with a person who has these ten qualities.”
